Class MazeGeneration

  • java.lang.Object
    • MazeGeneration
  • public class MazeGeneration
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the class that handles maze generation so far with one type that uses the recursive backtracker method which I learned from http://weblog.jamisbuck.org/2011/2/7/maze-generation-algorithm-recap

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      MazeGeneration​(int type, int x, int y)
      This is the MazeGeneration constructor, and takes in the maze type and size parameters

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void checkIfBoardDone()
      This method checks if every tile in the maze has been reached or not.
      void display​(java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Character>> maze)
      This method takes the maze array and feeds the block types and positions to the Graphics class
      int getLastSplit​(char type)
      This method returns the most recent split coordinate: x or y depending on the type
      static char getTileType​(int x, int y)
      This method returns the tile type at the passed in x and y location
      void mazeGen()
      This method generates the maze
      void mazeReset()
      This method resets the 2D ArrayLists that make up the maze
      void recordLastSplit​(int lastSplitX, int lastSplitY)
      This method adds the last split cell to the ArrayList of splits to be backtracked to later
      char tileSwapper​(char currentCell, char direction)
      This method will return what the current cell should become depending on what type it is and the direction

      • tileSwapper

        public char tileSwapper​(char currentCell,
                        char direction)
        This method will return what the current cell should become depending on what type it is and the direction
        Parameters:
        currentCell -
        direction -
        Returns:
        char the newCurrentCell which the old currentCell will become

      • checkIfBoardDone

        public void checkIfBoardDone()
        This method checks if every tile in the maze has been reached or not. It will stop generation if every tile has been reached.

        This method resets the 2D ArrayLists that make up the maze
